articles.title: China#39;s economic growth under threat as virus takes hold
articles.description: Growth in the world#39;s second-largest economy was already slowing in the latter half of last year with a property market slump and regulatory crackdowns, leading policymakers to set their lowest annual GDP target in decades for 2022.
articles.content:
